name: Herbalist (Matilda Lindell, SPARDA_Blizzard)
description:
This game is part 3 of 4 in an experimental prototype series where we each week make a new game around a new theme. This week's theme is making fun failure mechanics.

Game Idea:

Use the recipe book and combine ingredients to create potions to help customers fix their problems. The player can freely choose how many ingredients to put in the cauldron, but using too many or too few may cause new problems for the customer.

Controls:

Left mouse button to drag and drop items
